structure.unit: A JUDICIAL SUPPORT AGENCIES AND PERSONNEL

law.text:
The agency designated pursuant to KRS 27A.600 shall have the following duties in carrying out the provisions of KRS 27A.600 to 27A.640:
To develop, operate, and administer programs within the judicial district or districts served to provide free legal services to indigent clients involved in civil matters within the jurisdiction of the courts or the judicial district or districts.
To report annually to the Supreme Court of Kentucky, through the Administrative Office of the Courts, on its activities conducted pursuant to KRS 27A.600 to 27A.640.
To maintain an appropriate accounting of all funds received pursuant to KRS 27A.600 to 27A.640, and to prepare and submit to the Administrative Office of the Courts an annual statement accounting for the use of the funds.
To refund annually all unused or uncommitted funds as provided in KRS 27A.630(4).
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 338, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1994.
